snippet:
ID: US-05
Title: Update cart items
User Story: As a user, I want to modify the quantity or remove items in my cart before checking out.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Quantity can be increased or decreased in cart.
- Item can be removed from cart.
- Cart total updates dynamically.

ID: US-04
Title: Add product to cart
User Story: As a user, I want to add products to my cart so that I can purchase them later.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Product detail page has an 'Add to Cart' button.
- After adding, the cart is updated and shows confirmation.
- Out-of-stock products cannot be added.

ID: US-01
Title: Browse product categories
User Story: As a user, I want to browse categories so that I can find products of interest.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Category menu is visible in the top navigation.
- Clicking a category navigates to a filtered product listing.
- Product listings match the selected category.

User Story ID: US-03
Title: View product details
Story: As a user, I want to see detailed information about a product before making a purchase decision.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Clicking on a product opens the product detail page.
- Product detail includes name, price, image, description, and variants.
- Rating and review sections are visible.

User Story ID: US-19
Title: Manage address book
Story: As a user, I want to manage my addresses for easier checkout in future.
Acceptance Criteria:
- User can add, edit, or delete addresses.
- Address form includes all necessary fields.
- Changes are reflected in future checkouts.

ID: US-02
Title: Search for products
User Story: As a user, I want to search for products using keywords so I can find relevant items quickly.
Acceptance Criteria:
- Search bar is present on every page.
- Search results display products matching the keyword in title or description.
- If no products are found, a 'no results' message is shown.
